column4: Hi people, I'm building my 1st .DEB package, but I only know how to copy files to the system. To start, I want to know just how to put an icon of my application on the systenm menu. How???? Whinch kind of channel is suitable to this? Is there some #deb-packages or so?
I'm trying to find something on the internet but I got only too basic tutorials :(
then you need to consult the channels that ikonia pointed you too, because that is where the help is
